Hi There

I can recommend Stephen Turnbull's "Ninja" - ISBN 1 85314 109 7. =
It is an excellent and comprehensive work, although I am sure there will be=
 some who disagree!!     Currently selling at a reasonable =A37.95 on Amazo=
n.....

                            Rod Johnson

Synopsis on Amazon site
Th=
is is a true and revealing account of the Ninja, the Japanese clandestine w=
arrior cult of assassins and spies that has acquired a legendary status amo=
ng martial arts enthusiasts and military historians. From material previous=
ly unpublished in the West, Stephen Turnbull recounts the history, battles,=
 science, mysticism and even the modern aspects of the Ninja. Many of the s=
ources for this book are his own translations from Japanese archives. Myths=
 about the Ninja are exploded but the truth emerges here as far stronger th=
an any fiction, making this work destined to become the standard work.
